page.title: 12METROPOLE HOTEL
page.content: WITHIN THE COMPLEX THE BIRMINGHAM METROPOLE CONTAINS 500 TWIN BEDED ROOMS AND NINE LUXURY SUITES.THE HOTEL IS ALSO FURNISHED WITH AN ELEGANT LAKESIDE TERRACE RESTAURANT,GARDEN ROOM,RESTAURANT,EXTENSIVE LOUNGES,BARS,CONFERENCE AND BANQUETING FACILITIES AND OTHER TOP-CLASS AMENETIES. THE METROPOLE HOTEL IS EASY TO REACH FROM AROUND THE COUNTRY FOR CONFERENCES AND SHOWS DUE TO THE EASY ACCESS BY ROADS (M6,M42,A45) AND RAILWAYS, AND OFFERS EASY ACCOMODATION FOR PEOPLE INVOLVED IN SHOWS AND EXHIBITIONS. THE N.E.C AND METROPOLE COMPLIMENT EACH OTHER.THE METROPOLE IS WELL SERVED BY THE NEW PASSENGER TERMINAL AT BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT.
